name: Hermit Crab Exercise Wheel - Silent Running Wheel for Crab Tank Accessories - Small Animal Wheel for Hamster Gerbils Hedgehogs
short_description: 【Hermit Crab Climbing Toys】Hermit crabs are naturally active creatures and daily exercise is vital to keeping them happy and healthy. The Hermit Crab Runner will enrich their daily life and activities and give them plenty of exercise.

【Silent Toy】The hermit crab exercise wheel is designed with high quality steel bearing to ensure no noise when in use, say goodbye to annoying squeaks and noises! Let your pet enjoy the fun of exercising without interrupting your rest or work.
【Anti-Skid】The wheel surface has anti-slip stripes to increase friction, effectively reducing inertial falls while running and making it easy for hermit crabs to climb.

【Perfect Size】This small animal wheel toy is 3.34 inches/8.5 cm in height and the wheel diameter is 5 inches/12.7 cm. Suitable for wide variety of small animals, such as hermit crabs, hamsters, gerbils, chipmunks, ferrets, hedgehogs and more.

【Durable Material】This hermit crab climbing toy is made of high quality plastic and steel, wear-resistant, bite-resistant and long-lasting. The surface is very smooth and easily cleaned, can be washed with water directly.
product_description: Features Application - Suitable for wide variety of small animals, such as hermit crabs, hamsters, gerbils, chipmunks, ferrets, hedgehogs and more. name: Silent Runner 12" Regular | Wheel + Cage Attachment | Sugar Gliders, Hamsters, Rats
short_description: ✔ SAFE - The axle-free design eliminates a dangerous center bar, reducing the risk of fur/tail entanglement, pet wrap-a-round, curvature of the spine, and other injuries.

✔ SILENT - Innovative dual ball-bearings create a whisper-silent spin. Two stainless steel ball-bearings are within the back plate of the wheel, ensuring the wheel glides smooth and silent. The bearings SPIN around the bolt as your pet runs, unlike annoying squeaky wheels on the market that have a center axle that creates friction and noise.
✔ SANITARY - Wheel completely disassembles for deep cleaning, no nooks for feces to hide in.
✔ IDEAL FOR - Sugar Gliders, larger Hamsters, and other similar small animals (not suggested for chewers)

name: 9in Silent Hamster Wheel with 2 Natural Chew Toys - Wooden Exercise Wheel with Removable Track, Quiet Spinner for Gerbils, Mice, Hamsters,Mouse,Syrian Hamster(9in)
short_description: 2 Natural Chew Toys & Large Size This is the M size, about 9.0 inches *4.92 inches *10.43 inches (length * width * height), Diameter of 9.0 inches. Suitable for any hamster, Gerbils, Mice,Mouse,Syrian Hamster,This complete kit includes our silent exercise wheel plus two natural vine ball chew toys for extended fun.

Ultra-Quiet Nighttime Operation (<15dB) Featuring silent spinning technology with dual stainless steel ball bearings and a smooth wooden track, this wheel operates at less than 15dB—quieter than a whisper. It's the perfect, sleep-friendly solution for your pet's nighttime activities without any disruptive squeaks.

Waterproof, Easy-Clean & Chew-Resistant Design The soft, removable running track is waterproof, anti-slip, and scratch-resistant, backed by a waterproof isolation layer for double protection. Both parts are washable for effortless cleaning. Made from reinforced, high-quality natural wood, the frame resists chewing damage, making it more durable than plastic wheels and softer than harsh metal ones.

Sturdy, Stable & Anti-Tip Construction Engineered with a 20% wider, weighted base, this wheel remains firmly in place during the most energetic runs, preventing tipping and ensuring your pet's safety. It provides a secure and reliable exercise solution for all small animals.
